# useChain

A hook that returns the current chain as well as a function to set the chain

## Import

```ts
import { useChain } from "@account-kit/react";
```

## Parameters

### mutationArgs

`UseChainParams`
optional properties which contain mutation arg overrides

## Returns

`UseChainResult`
an object containing the current chain and a function to set the chain as well as loading state of setting the chain
